post.body: thank you! ;)
anything with Will Farrell
That gift wins best gift of the PLN. Nobody can top that. Congratulations. He's beautiful!
thank you for that musical greeting. :)
thank you ;)
hate when that happens. LOL. What did u get? Twitpic?
holidays are always tough for empty chairs. Thoughts are with you.
yeah. Let me know if it works. Unfortunately for me, my Sony SD card won't fit.
Strange, isn't it? Each man's life touches so many other lives. When he isn't around he leaves an awful hole, doesn't he?
Lots of cool updates.
Are you following @noradsanta on Twitter?
I guess I didn't realize it until I saw your new one.
and that paves the way for me to say, "I LOVE your new one, Dahlling!!!"
I just told you (on Plurk) that your old profile pic sucked. But I guess I just told you here on Twitter too.
he,he, didn't know they'd be sending a reminder. Tho' the reminder I got was pretty cool. Listing all who can come & can't.
Who's playing with the toys? You or the kids? Come on, tell the truth.
Share a twitpic of your favorite (or most "interesting") gift.
Don't celebrate Christmas but love the day, cheer, peace, happiness and when people wish me a Merry Christmas anyway.
And Blue Man Group totally ROCKED. Nothing like seeing them in their own venue.
On our way back from Ocala. Had nice visit my my parents.
